item.title: Marp to PDF
item.author: Author
item.description: Here is a way to convert Marp slides in PDF with emojis: 1 npx @marp-team/marp-cli main.md -o output.pdf --allow-local-files https://github.com/marp-team/marp-cli nodejs must be installed
